definition[0]: someone or something that moves in a particular way
definition[1]: someone whose job is to move furniture, boxes etc from one house to another when someone changes where they live
definition[2]: something that moves things from one place to another
definition[3]: a stock or share that people are buying and selling a lot of
definition[4]: someone who makes a formal proposal at a meeting
definition[5]: a share whose price has increased or decreased a lot in a particular period
example[3]: It was one of todayâ€™s major movers - up 10 to 468.
